title: The Backup QB Landscape, Hurts’s and Tua’s Futures, and Belichick’s Decision-making
description:
Nora and Mal answer 10 listener questions about who would win the Super Bowl if every starting QB were out, whether Jared Goff should be benched, the futures of Hurts and Tua, and much more.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Mallory Rubin
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
